title: 'Best guest ever!' Gloria Hunniford introduces ADORABLE new puppy Polly on Loose Women
text:
'Best guest ever!' Gloria Hunniford introduces ADORABLE new puppy Polly on Loose Women The ITV show got a whole lot cuter when the Cavalier King Charles Spaniel came on! Share Click   Gloria Hunniford has the cutest puppy in the world Share this video Get celebs   
Gloria Hunniford introduced her adorable new puppy Polly on Loose Women today. 
The Loose Women panelist brought her new addition on to the show, and everyone in the audience and the panel couldn’t deal with how cute the Cavalier King Charles Spaniel was! 
Gloria confessed: “I’ve been watching her 24/7 like she’s a little toy. 
“She’s lovely.” Gloria's new addition was brought on to Loose Women (Photo: ITV) Polly is literally adorable (Photo: ITV) She could not be any cuter (Photo: ITV) 
However, having a new puppy hasn’t been all plain sailing for Gloria! 
She added: “I was wearing a jacket and she was biting it. 
“She’s taken all the top layer off, so that’s one jacket gone!” 
Gloria confessed she chose to get Polly after her dog Roxie - who was also a Cavalier - died from a heart complaint over Christmas, but insisted she’s not “replacing” her. Gloria is so happy with her pup (Photo: ITV) SO CUTE! (Photo: ITV) 
While she still also has dog Gemma, she said: “I love the breed so much I got another one. 
“I knew I loved the dog so much, but didn’t realise how deeply until we lost her.” 
Loose Women viewers fell in love with the pup, with one saying: “Omg polly is so cute Omg #LooseWomen.” 
Another gushed: “Polly is the best guest @loosewomen have ever had.” 
*Loose Women continues on ITV1 weekdays at 12.30pm Like us on Facebook
